mapper.select: SELECT msg.* FROM tb_msg msg LEFT JOIN tb_personnel per ON per.work_num = msg.work_num LEFT JOIN t_user t_u ON t_u.per_id = per.per_id where t_u.pkid=#{userId} and msg.`type`=#{type} and msg.status=#{status} and (msg.msg_content like CONCAT('%',#{selectName},'%') or msg.msg_content like CONCAT('%',#{selectName},'%') or msg.msg_content like CONCAT('%',#{selectName},'%')) order by msg.send_time desc
mapper.update: update tb_msg set status=1 where pkid=#{pkid}
update tb_msg set status=#{status},remark=#{remark},updated = now() where pkid=#{pkid}
mapper.select: select tag.tag_id,tag.work_num,u.display_name from tb_tag_personnel tag join tb_personnel p on p.work_num = tag.work_num join t_user u on u.per_id=p.per_id where u.pkid=#{userId}
select count(*) from tb_msg where task_id = #{taskId} and work_num = #{workNum}
mapper.update: update tb_ht_analyze set status=1 where process_id=#{processId} and operator=#{operator}

select count(*) from twf_dict where `name`=#{name} and `type`=#{type} and is_vaild=1
select * from tb_ht_handover where process_id = #{processId} limit 1
select process_id from tb_ht_analyze where operator = #{workNum} and status=0
mapper.update: update tb_ht_analyze set status = 0 where process_id = #{processId}
update tb_ht_handover set now_step = #{nowStep},updated=now(),operator=#{operator} where process_id = #{processId}
update tb_ht_change set now_step = #{nowStep} where process_id = #{processId}
